channel.title: SO many players
channel.description: Any one else noticed that like the first 7-8 members worlds are full?

item.title: SO many players
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

I think there might of just been a membership increase, or players playing more frequently.
I mean why would these updates increase the player count dramatically? the players that quit 3-4 years ago have moved on.

Read full topic

item.title: SO many players
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:32, topic:380870”]I think you’re playing at the wrong times or some shit.

There are currently 199,127 players online as I’m writing this message, and it’s a school day…[/quote]I was playing at ~3am my time ._.

[quote=“Jc22493, post:33, topic:380870”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=476695.msg3488135#msg3488135 date=1296762103]

[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=476695.msg3488096#msg3488096 date=1296757896]

Before it was announced it usually peaked at 185-200k players online every weekend, I saw 245k last weekend.

I don’t know where people are getting these ~110k increase numbers, maybe they’re thinking before the update which was launched at 6am EST…
[/quote]I was watching the average player count (at the times I play) and it usually hovered around 100k max (not on weekends)
Now it’s over 200k at the moment, at the same time and day as when I usually looked at it.

Proof or everything you’re saying is made up.
[/quote]Don’t be dumb, why would I take pictures of the average player count. But Clawz Fury saw it as well.
I don’t see why you don’t believe me, as there were less than 100,000 players on when I went to play last night.

Don’t get mad, it was a joke.[/quote]TOO LATE I’M ALREADY FUCKING MAD

Read full topic

item.title: SO many players

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=476695.msg3486798#msg3486798 date=1296643537]

Before it was announced it usually peaked at 185-200k players online every weekend, I saw 245k last weekend.

I don’t know where people are getting these ~110k increase numbers, maybe they’re thinking before the update which was launched at 6am EST…
[/quote]I was watching the average player count (at the times I play) and it usually hovered around 100k max (not on weekends)
Now it’s over 200k at the moment, at the same time and day as when I usually looked at it.

Proof or everything you’re saying is made up.
[/quote]Don’t be dumb, why would I take pictures of the average player count. But Clawz Fury saw it as well.
I don’t see why you don’t believe me, as there were less than 100,000 players on when I went to play last night.[/quote]
Don’t get mad, it was a joke.

Read full topic
